should display newly earned badges on badge page

should handle event logging failures gracefully
should display badges on profile page
should show badge progress or status
should have working badges API endpoint
should have working badge events API endpoint
should handle badge API errors gracefully
should have proper ARIA labels for badges
should load badges page without errors
